name: App ID
description: ID of product as allocated by Steam.

name: Name
description: Product name

name: Short Description
description: The blurb that appears below the header image of the product.

name: Developer
description: Whoever created the product.

name: Publisher
description: Whoever published the product.

name: Genre
description: The genre(s) that the product is in.

name: Tags
description: The tags that have been assigned to the product.

name: Type
description: Whether the product is a game or hardware (non-game software is also labelled as a game, so you should use the tags to identify those products).

name: Categories
description: The categories/features that the product has.

name: Owners
description: An approximate number of owners, according to Steam Spy.

name: Positive Reviews
description: The number of positive reviews the product has.

name: Negative Reviews
description: The number of negativereviews the product has.

name: Price
description: The price of the game in USD.

name: Initial Price
description: The price of the game in USD at launch.

name: Discount
description: What percentage sale the product was off by as of 2022/11/8.

name: CCU
description: Peak concurrent players as of 2022/11/8.

name: Languages
description: The languages that the product is available in.

name: Platforms
description: What operating systems the product is available on.

name: Release Date
description: When the product was first released.

name: Required Age
description: Whether the user needs to be over a certain age to legally purchase.

name: Website
description: The website of the developer/publisher of the product.

name: Header Image
description: A link to the header image of the game.
